description:
The Quetzalcoatl was the http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Alliance] flagship of the http://anidb.net/ch96413 [7th Fleet] under Vice Admiral http://anidb.net/ch774 [Hoghwood].
The Quetzalcoatl participated in the Alliance invasion of Imperial territory in 796 UC. Low on supplies, the 7th Fleet was attacked by the Kircheis Fleet in the Dverger System and encircled. Vice Admiral Hawood accepted Vice Admiral http://anidb.net/ch187 [Kircheis]` surrender recommendation, and the Quetzalcoatl presumably fell into Imperial hands.
Source: Gineipaedia
name: Quetzalcoatl
